Photo: Stephen Lovekin, Staff Image 24 of 24 Chrissy Teigen is coming to Houston to dish up her epic fried chicken wings 1 / 24 Back to Gallery Chrissy Teigen can't get enough of Houston. Just days after celebrating the Super Bowl in Houston's NRG Stadium, the model and amazing cook has planned a trip to return to the Bayou City.
And she's bringing her famous chicken wings with her.
According to CultureMap Houston , Teigen is coming back to the Space City for the VIBES by SI Swimsuit Festival on February 17 and 18 and she's going to be serving up two of her original favorites: John's Fried Chicken Wings with Spicy Honey Butter and Frito Pie Bar , both of which are featured in her cookbook " Cravings ."
Teigen's husband, musician John Legend, has also set a return date to Houston in May for a concert at The Woodlands Pavilion.
PLUS: The "Love Me Now" singer reveals his disagreements with wife, Chrissy Teigen
Media: People COMING TO HOUSTON: John Legend is among the artists coming to Houston in 2017
The other festivities during the two-day festival include music by Miguel and headliner Diplo and a food festival with other well-known national and regional chefs - including Chris Shepherd of Underbelly, Terrence Gallivan and Seth Siefel Gardner of The Pass & Provisions, and Tyson Cole of Uchi.
Tickets to the festival start at $35 for Saturday's general admission tickets and the VIP All In Pass for Friday and Saturday are $250. Single VIP tickets for either Friday or Saturday start at $150.
"Houston is thrilled to be the home of the 2017 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit launch and music, food and culture festival," Mike Waterman, president of the Greater Houston Convention and Visitors Bureau, said in a press release . "As the culinary and cultural capital of the South, we think this event is a perfect opportunity to work with an iconic brand like Sports Illustrated to showcase Houston to the world."
